title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\ShieldedInstanceConfig
name: ShieldedInstanceConfig
description:
A set of Shielded Instance options.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.ShieldedInstanceConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.enable_integrity_monitoring
params.description: Defines whether the instance has integrity monitoring enabled. Enabled by default.

params.name: data.enable_secure_boot
params.description: Defines whether the instance has Secure Boot enabled. Disabled by default.

params.name: data.enable_vtpm
params.description: Defines whether the instance has the vTPM enabled. Enabled by default.
